title: Lux Dual Grip Socks - Soccer Grip Socks for Men and Women. GripArray™ Performance & Comfort - Anti-Slip Grip Socks for Soccer
description: Anti-Slip Grip Soccer Socks with GripArray: Dual inner and outer grip system. LUX’s inner grips prevent slipping inside the sock, locking your foot, sock, and shoe together. Double-sided internal grips ensure stability for explosive moves. Ideal for soccer players seeking top-notch grip socks for unmatched performance.

Quality, Comfort & Control: Toe and heel reinforcement padding reduce friction for precise moves. Our grip socks offer the performance needed for soccer enthusiasts and professional athletes. The 360 arch compression enhances comfort and control to help you dominate the game, safely, with washing-machine friendly rubber bands to keep your foot secure.

Most Durable Materials & Construction: Moisture-wicking High-Performance PVC keeps your feet cool and comfortable. High-quality materials and double needle count stitching ensure durability, lasting through numerous washes. Backed by our 100-day guarantee.

Increased Compression for Injury prevention: Provides safety and support for young athletes. The youth soccer grip socks are perfect for training and matches, preventing blisters and injuries by keeping feet stable in cleats. Trusted by 100K players and approved by professionals.

Perfect Fit: Any Size, Style & Sport: Available for men (US 6-11.5) and women & youth (US 4-6). Suitable for soccer and other sports like basketball and volleyball or any workout where you need peak performance and a reliable footing. Highlight your best moves with our range of colors. Other run-of-the-mill socks are for amateurs. Don’t let this one slip. Stride with confidence, glide through the field like a Pro.
